official_title: A bill to strengthen the assignment program for durable medical equipment under title XVIII of the Social Security Act, and for other purposes.
short_title: Durable Medical Equipment Disclosure Amendments of 1985

summary.text: Durable Medical Equipment Disclosure Amendments of 1985 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require that payment for durable medical equipment be made on the basis of an itemized bill or on the basis of an assignment under which there must be a full written disclosure to a Medicare beneficiary of the equipment supplied and its cost.

titles.title: Durable Medical Equipment Disclosure Amendments of 1985
A bill to strengthen the assignment program for durable medical equipment under title XVIII of the Social Security Act, and for other purposes.
